conversations.content:
QUESTION 5

Seti is a fierce human rights defender in Kite Republic and has litigated and won many cases before the constitutional court. However, Seti has been disillusioned that his victory in court has not necessarily led to tangible benefits to the people of Kite Community. He has come to your office to find out the challenges that underpin implementation of human rights decisions after learning about your expertise in the field of human rights.
 
a)  	Assess the challenges of implementing human rights decisions and what can be done to overcome some of the challenges in the context of a transformative and progressive agenda of the 2010 Constitution.       	(10 marks)
b)  	Seti has considered approaching the East African Court of Justice to try and get better results. The problem is that he does not understand the procedure in this court and has asked for your opinion on how to litigate before it. Prepare a detailed account of the most important points he must consider.       	(10marks)

1 / 1I am going to send you information about repudiating a building contract, that I want you to remember for now. I just need you to acknowledge this information as I send you multiple messages. Do you understand?
為啥律師都要註明自己的學歷？？

tu es expert en responsabilité civile en droit français, aide moi à faire la dissertation portant sur le sujet suivant: 
« Faut-il supprimer la responsabilité du fait des choses de droit commun ? »
Is open ai responsible for misuse of artificial intelligence?
What are 10 common events that cause disputes in residential construction?

우리는 한국의 데이터 플랫폼을 제공하는 소프트웨어 회사인데, 미국의 wenda라는 회사와 sales agreement / partnership 계약을 체결 준비중입니다.
계약서에 들어갈 General Terms and Condition 에는 어떤 내용이 들어가야 할까?번역결과We are a software company that provides a Korean data platform, and we are preparing to sign a sales agreement / partnership agreement with a company called wenda in the United States.
What should be included in the General Terms and Conditions in the contract?
Tell me about WireX and how it is regulated.  Also advise what risks and protections a Hong Kong applicant of the WireX debit card is subject to, especially in terms of personal data protection.
Why do people get sentenced for so many years like 1,503 years?
